content.query:
create schema intmd;

create table intmd.Application(
    ID varchar(18),
    OwnerID varchar(18),
    Name varchar(255),
    RecordTypeId varchar(18),
    Account varchar(18),
    Amortization_Term decimal(16,2),
    CL_Product_Name varchar(255),
    CL_Product varchar(255),
    CL_Purpose varchar(255),
    Interest_Rate decimal(16,2),
    LTV_Pledged_Collateral decimal(16,2),
    Loan_Amount decimal(16,2),
    Status varchar(255),
    Term decimal,
    Total_Score decimal(16,2),
    Adjustment_LTV decimal(16,2),
    Approval_Date datetime,
    CL_Contract varchar(18),
    Current_LTV_Including_Prompt_HS decimal(16,2),
    Current_LTV_Including_Prompt_LS decimal(16,2),
    Current_LTV_Including_Prompt decimal(16,2),
    Decline_Reason varchar(18),
    Estimate_LTV_HS decimal(16,2),
    Estimate_LTV decimal(16,2),
    Estimated_LTV_LS decimal(16,2),
    Prompt_LTV decimal(16,2),
    Weighted_LTV decimal(16,2),
    LTV_Before_PFS_Loan decimal(16,2),
    CLTV decimal(16,2),
    LTV decimal(16,2),
    Term_in_months decimal(16,2),
    Total_no_of_co_borrowers decimal,
    Co_borrower_names varchar(1000),
    Created_Date datetime,
    Created_By_ID varchar(18),
    Last_Modified_Date datetime,
    Last_Modified_By_ID varchar(18)
);

insert into edw.Application(ID,OwnerId,Name) values('a001','owner1','Surya1');
insert into edw.Application(ID,OwnerId,Name) values('a002','owner2','Surya2');

SELECT * from  edw.Application;
